title: * Explanation - The FSI of 3
clause_text: * Explanation - The FSI of 3.00 is to be calculated separately on the one-fourth of plot area for Affordable Housing Component as well as three-fourth of plot area for Free- Sale Housing component. The Affordable Housing Component under the Scheme shall be handed over along with the Â¼th part of the total plot of land, free of cost to the concerned ULB.
section: Release of FSI under the Scheme shall be as follows :-
